properties.name: nms.security.jwt.token-expiration-millis
properties.description: Defines the lifespan of the JWT (JSON Web Tokens) in milliseconds.

properties.name: nms.security.jwt.token-secret
properties.description: This property is used to store the secret key for encoding and decoding JWT (JSON Web Tokens).

properties.name: nms.security.admin.username
properties.description: This property is used to define the username for the admin user.

properties.name: nms.security.admin.password
properties.description: This property is used to define the password for the admin user.

properties.name: nms.security.admin.email
properties.description: This property is used to define the email for the admin user.
